body_html:
@tuandnvn can you try version 0.11:
https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.11/get_started/os_setup.html#download-and-setup

Based on the error it looks like the op with a missing GPU kernel is UnsortedSegmentSum, but that support was added in this commit:
88686b3

So I'm expecting it to work in 0.11, or at least you'll run into a different problem. :)
body_text:
@tuandnvn can you try version 0.11:
https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.11/get_started/os_setup.html#download-and-setup
Based on the error it looks like the op with a missing GPU kernel is UnsortedSegmentSum, but that support was added in this commit:
88686b3
So I'm expecting it to work in 0.11, or at least you'll run into a different problem.  :)
body:
@tuandnvn can you try version 0.11:
https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.11/get_started/os_setup.html#download-and-setup

Based on the error it looks like the op with a missing GPU kernel is UnsortedSegmentSum, but that support was added in this commit:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/88686b308146887a88903c883bed7affc650e076

So I'm expecting it to work in 0.11, or at least you'll run into a different problem.  :)
